Post-Match Reflections: Yeah, it was something that was important, for the middle-order to come and string together a partnership was good to see. It's happened quite a few times over the past few games,We have a lot of talent in that batting unit, we will keep giving them the chances, it's up to them to make the most of it. I thought Sanju showed how well he could play with that knock, it's all about taking your opportunities.
Was an important knock from Shreyas, couldn't have asked anything more from him, Jaddu came up well with the bat

We'll sit down tomorrow, see what we can do, we have used 27 players so far, there could be more. When you win the series, there are guys who haven't had the opportunities. Some of the guys will have to play Tests, we'll have to look after everyone. It's the sign of the times we're in,
